title: Why do people who claim to be scientist find themselves unable to provide proof for their flying ball fantasies? All they seem to do is ridicule and offer claims to authority and then block you. - Quora

response.answer_text: are you the guy who was blocked by dr. rosen? if so, i explained it to you. as soon as we see that your question can be answered by books aimed at second graders we dismiss you. ridicule is the appropriate response. as for claims to authority. we arent debating you. we are telling you how it is. so we dont need any roberts rules and we are definitely the authorities. once we know that you are arguing some ridiculous stuff, we dismiss you and block if need be. with or without the added comment that if you are so smart as to argue this with a physicist, you should be plenty smart to go and dig out all the equations and how to use them and prove whatever nonsense you are thinking. if you wouldnt mind, when you are done snap a pic and let us see. i can hardly wait.

There is no proof when you simply choose to reject all of reality. No one can prove anything to you when your only argument is that what they are saying is not true. Your denying that something is true does not make it untrue, except in your own mind. Arguing with you and trying to convince you that what you choose to believe is not fact, is futile, it is a waste of time and effort. It is understandable that once a person realizes that they are arguing with someone who rejects reality they will give up and stop wasting their time.
